name: Lightning Angel Litona Liliche 섬광천사 리토나 리리셰
name_original: Lightning Angel Litona Liliche 섬광천사 리토나 리리셰
description:
Synopsis
Cheon Kisin, a genius scientist, lives with an AI girl in the lab of the remote forest.
He has a Hero suit, but he doesn't want to use it.-He hates a hero.
One day a magic girl, Liiliche, appeared before him.
She urges him to escape from the city as soon as possible to save his life ...Features of this game build
1) A visual novel featuring text-based story with narration, computer graphics
2) A unique story plot-Hero and Magic girl coexist in the same world
3) About 10-Hour playtime.
4) Narrated by professional voice actors with beautiful CG.
5) Original OSTChracters
Litona Liliche / Magic girl







ACO / A.I.







Barken / Villain
